channel.title: 2TB Fantom Drives GreenDrive - Not installing Drivers
channel.description:
Hello. When I plug in my new External HDD into my PC using USB 3.0, it doesn't install all the drivers needed. I cant find what I am looking for online (Driver installations). I only see the drive in Device Manager with a "!" Symbol saying that the drivers aren't installed. Searching for drivers produces no results.
What is wrong? OS = Win7

item.title: 2TB Fantom Drives GreenDrive - Not installing Drivers
item.dc:creator: Phobos001
item.description:
calhoun freeman:

USB 2.0 not compatible with 3.0.

3.0 BACKWARDS compatible with 2.0.

I know that, I have a 3.0 card and cord and all are connected. The problem is that it cant find any drivers to install.

EDIT: Problem resolved, got the drivers from the System32 folder. :retard:

Read full topic
item.source: 2TB Fantom Drives GreenDrive - Not installing Drivers
